name: playwright_framework
description: Playwright framework built for production level automation testing

scripts.e2e: npm run copy-history && npm run cleanup-env && (npm run test || true) && npm run send-email && npm run move-history && npm run generate-report && npm run show-report
scripts.e2e:chrome: npm run copy-history && npm run cleanup-env && (npm run test:chrome || true) && npm run send-email && npm run move-history && npm run generate-report && npm run show-report
scripts.e2e:firefox: npm run copy-history && npm run cleanup-env && (npm run test:firefox || true) && npm run send-email && npm run move-history && npm run generate-report && npm run show-report
scripts.e2e:safari: npm run copy-history && npm run cleanup-env && (npm run test:safari || true) && npm run send-email && npm run move-history && npm run generate-report && npm run show-report
